title: Smart Data Models - BasicIntervalSchedule
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Schedule of values at points in time.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be BasicIntervalSchedule

startTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The time for the first time point. Default: ''

value1Unit.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Value1 units of measure. Default: None

value2Unit.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Value2 units of measure. Default: None
